#summary Software required to run Spock.

= Mandatory dependencies =
 * Java 5 or higher
 * Groovy 1.6.x (latest maintenance release recommended)
 * JUnit 4.4 or higher

*Note*: Groovy 1.7 betas are _not_ currently supported (try at your own risk).

= Optional dependencies =
Dropping one of these on the classpath will enable additional features. No configuration required.
 * CGLIB 2.1_3: enables mocking of classes
 * Objenesis 1.1: enables mocking of classes w/o default constructor (requires CGLIB)
